title: These PLASTIC straws that come in a PLASTIC bag are ... - Reddit

- waddledeefan2009 (2020-07-06): These PLASTIC straws that come in a PLASTIC bag are individually wrapped in PLASTIC

summary:
The comments express frustration and disappointment with the excessive use of plastic, especially in the context of single-use items like straws and utensils. The comments convey a negative sentiment towards the use of plastic and its impact on the environment. 

Sentiment: -0.8
